name: Dopplerganger.app

idea:
Now we are in the digital era and things and requirements changes according to time and needs. We can see everything is going digital from booking plans and railways tickets to buying groceries online. Things are evolving very fast and of course, we are adopting it too. But always there is scope for improvement in every situation. People expect this and this is how the process of continuous up-gradation goes on.


 In this scenario, e-commerce is the fastest-growing sector where we can see intense competition and the fight is between big multinational firms and small-medium traders of our country. But due to the heavy investment of capitalists and lack of affordability to Morden technology, our small and medium traders are losing out. Keeping this in mind, we have taken an initiative for those people who are lagging in this race. 


So we have decided to empower our traders with cutting edge technology. Which is affordable and easy to use. This is an e-commerce app named “Localiya”. Localiya is a unified and intermediary app solution for small and medium traders, retailers and sellers. Localiya is a location-based app that provides a digital environment and works like an e-commerce platform between sellers and customers. 


Sellers can create their online store and sell their products/services in their neighbourhood. 

Localiya will support the following types of sellers:


Retail Shops

Grocery Shop

Pottery Shops

Clothing Shop

Shopping Marts

Restaurants

Street Vendors

Kitchens

Milkman

And many more.

For customers, this app is also very convenient. They will get quick fast delivery. They can choose trusted shops from their nearby and place the order. 


Localiya

             

Copyrights © 2020 Localiya | All rights reserved.
name: Localiya Digital Marketplace

idea:
Gravitino plus India has been launched with a special focus on restructuring the current agricultural farming model to enhance the income of farmers at grass root level using organic farming modern practices. Our model is trying to bridge the gap in production deficit in the segment of food grain (oilseeds and pulses) and raw medicinal plant material, which are 2 important cash crop commodities.

Our model is focused on developing sustainable regional grain and medicinal plant agri-food cluster for the upliftment of the regional rural economy and doubling the farm income. Agri-food clusters can become one of the tools for creating high-performance well-orchestrated production facilities to ensure food supply as well as sustainable development of the agri-food sector.

To make the agri-cluster model successful, Gravitino is instrumental to develop a common platform to connect 3 stakeholders: government, farmers, and agro supply chain members to maintain supply-demand ratio. Gravitino’s role will be an operational partner to run this model smoothly by extending government subsidies, policies & benefits to farmers, to safeguard farmer's income from any unforeseen natural calamities, and to promote farmers to adapt & implement new profit-driven practices. Pan-India scalability of this model can be achieved through different governmental agencies like agricultural universities, rural agricultural nodal centers, and various farmers organizations.

This model has been discussed and developed by the Ministry of Ayush, Ministry of Agriculture, and MSME ministry. Gravitino has also involved CSR funds from private multi-national companies to support and expand this model to satisfy government needs.
name: GRAVITINO PLUS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Shree Chakrapani Environmental Consultant provides services for Environmental Impact Assessment study (EIA), Environmental Clearance (EC) from MoEF, State / UT Pollution Control Board, No Objection Certificate (NOC)/ Consent To Establish (CTE) , Consent to Operate(CTO), Consolidated Consent & Authorization (CCA) from State / UT Pollution Control Board, Forest Clearance, CRZ clearance, CGWA Clearance or any other environmental Clearance from statutory authorities.

SCEC carries out Environmental Audit, Safety Audits, Environmental monitoring for its various clients, establishes QEHS management systems as per ISO 9001, ISO 14001, & OHSAS 18001 standards.

SCEC provides total engineering solutions from concept to completion for waste water collection, treatment, conveyance and disposal, Effluent Treatment Plants (ETP) and Sewage Treatment Plant (STP). We also give Municipal Solid Waste (MSW) management system, Solid Hazardous Waste Management system (SWM).
name: SHREE CHAKRAPANI ENVIRONMENTAL CONSULTANT
